DOC.brief_summary: Children bear obese woman risk increase adiposity later adverse metabolic outcome . We conduct follow-up study exist clinical trial , call LiP study ( Lifestyle Pregnancy ) , registration number NCT00530439 , 360 obese pregnant woman randomize either lifestyle intervention routine obstetric care . This present study follow child 3 year age . We hypothesis , intervention pregnancy result low degree adiposity metabolic risk factor offspring . Clinical examination take place age 2.5-3 year include anthropometric measurement , Dual energy x-ray ( DXA ) scan blood sample measure metabolic marker .
